constant.Name: VERIFY_ONCE
constant.Comment: Force verification of all MIDlet suite classes to be done only once during the suite installation

constant.Name: VERIFY_SUITE_HASH
constant.Comment: Defines whether suite JAR should be checked for changes since the suite installation.

constant.Name: VERIFY_HASH_RESOURCENAME
constant.Comment: Resource name to save the suite hash on classes preverification

constant.Name: SUITE_VERIFIER_MIDLET
constant.Comment: Name of the system MIDlet to verify MIDlet suite classes
